articles.author: Bruce Carroll
articles.title: Country Music Rocked by Cultural Earthquakes This Week - PJ Media
articles.description:
The world of country music was jolted this week when two major artists were swept up in the changing cultural winds of racial and sexual norms.
News broke on Tuesday of a drunken Morgan Wallen caught...
